name: AdventureQuest 3D
description: Enter the world of AdventureQuest... re-imagined as a 3D, cross-platform, massively multiplayer game.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Dual Core 1.8GHZ or Single Core 3.0GHZ Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Dual Core 2.66GHZ Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB Storage: 1 GB available space
